page.title: 18EATING OUT IN WENTBRIDGE.
page.content: A few weeks ago, as part of this survey, the three 4th. year children and three of the 3rd. year children from East Hardwick Cawood's J.&I. School interviewed the managers of the Wentbridge Hotel, Swiss Cottage Restaurant and the Blue Bell Inn. Having seen all the delicious food, the 4th years decided to ask if we could have a meal at one of them for our leaving treat from school. It was arranged that we would go to the Swiss Cottage. We were treated as very special guests. Here is our menu. Starters: Melon (1 plain, 1 with blackcurrant sorbet) Prawn Cocktail. Main Course: Fillet Steak, mushrooms, chips and onion rings. Sweet: Blackcurrant Cheesecake, Peach Charlotte and Chocolate Pavlova. We all enjoyed our meal very much. We explored the gardens before leaving
